# PTTransmissionMode.fullDuplex

**Case**

A type that indicates a participant can simultaneously receive and transmit audio.

## Declaration

```swift
case fullDuplex
```

## Modes

- **PTTransmissionMode.halfDuplex**: A type that indicates a participant can’t simultaneously receive and transmit audio.
- **PTTransmissionMode.listenOnly**: A type that indicates a participant can only receive audio.

items.description: A type that indicates a participant can’t simultaneously receive and transmit audio.
